extension.description: Dash Radio is a digital radio broadcasting platform over 80 original stations. These stations are curated by DJs, radio personalities, musicians, and music tastemakers. The platform includes partner stations curated by Snoop Dogg, Kylie Jenner, Lil Wayne, Tech N9ne, Borgore, B-Real of Cypress Hill, and others.

extension.description: Listen to over 35 million songs in the Napster music catalog. Manage your music library and playlists in a comfortable way. Use top artists, albums and tracks or radio stations to discover something new. A Rhapsody subscription is required.

Multi-emulator front-end and general application launcher for Kodi. Includes offline scrapers for MAME and No-Intro ROM sets and also supports scrapping ROM metadata and artwork online. ROM auditing for No-Intro ROMs using No-Intro or Redump XML DAT files. Launching of games and standalone applications is also available.

extension.news:
[COLOR lavender][B]Order Favourites[/B][/COLOR] [B]1.2.1:[/B] - Experimental Matrix version now available.
[B]1.2.0:[/B] - Fixed a case when the add-on failed to read the favourites file because of Unicode strings. (Thanks to [I]msauers[/I] for the report.) - Changed the label and description of the 'Restart...' button to 'Restore...', which is clearer.
[B]1.1.1:[/B] - Added menu items for a more traditional add-on UX. - Improved the profile reloading process.
[B]1.1.0:[/B] - Improved the profile reloading process, it was crashing on Kodi 17.6.
[B]1.0.4:[/B] - Safer handling of unicode text. - Optimizations, simplified the code even more.
[B]1.0.3:[/B] - Added a proper custom dialog interface. - Greatly simplified the code, much faster to use.
[B]1.0.2:[/B] - Fix for when the favorite item has unicode text.
extension.description: Lets you reorder the entries in your Favourites. Use this to organize your Favourites.

extension.summary: Put all your favourites bits of all your favourites addons into one easy to use addon.
extension.description: Super Favourites is a better way of managing your Kodi Favourites.[CR][CR]Virtually any menu item within Kodi can be added to Super Favourites, even from addons that don't normally provide this feature.[CR][CR]Super Favourites allows you to better manage your Kodi favourites, including the creation of sub-folders, into which your Kodi favourites can then be copied or moved into.[CR][CR]This allows you to create you own custom addon with just the best bits of your favourite addons. Search your favourite addons, play your favourite music, read your favourite comic strips, select your favourite playlists, browse your favourite movies, listen to your favourite radio stations, watch your favourite cartoons, the possibilities are endless, all from within one easy to use addon.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news:
2.0.10: 6 June 2021 - Fixed bug that prevented Hebrew language for working
2.0.9: 15 May 2021 - Fixed bug in Player.def activateWindowCommand(cmd) that was messing up the ability to return from child direrctories
2.0.8: 14 May 2021 - Fixed various incompatibilities with latest version of Matrix involving decode('utf-8') that caused crashes.
2.0.7: 17 February 2021 - Fixed remote folder access via another plugin
2.0.6: 11 January 2021 - Fixed access to local folders and smb folders
2.0.5: 12 December 2020 - More Fixes for Network Folder Failure to Launch
2.0.0: 29 November 2020 - Matrix Version
1.0.60: 1 November 2020 - Fixed launch issues in Kodi Leia
1.0.59: 29th May 2017 - 'Now playing' text now defined by SF due to skin variations

extension.summary: Crackle leverer populære, prisvindende tv, film og originaler. Uden grænser for, hvor meget du kan se på tværs af alle dine enheder, kan du binge alt, hvad du vil, uanset hvor du vil.
Crackle delivers popular, award-winning TV, movies and originals. With no limit to how much you can watch across all your devices, you can binge all you want, wherever you want.
Crackle은 수상 경력에 빛나는 인기 있는 TV, 영화 및 원본을 제공합니다. 모든 장치에서 볼 수 있는 양에 제한 없이 원하는 곳 어디서나 원하는 대로 즐길 수 있습니다.
extension.description: Crackle er en distributør af videostreaming af originale webserier, Hollywoodfilm og tv-serier. Grundlagt i begyndelsen af 2000'erne som Grouper og omdøbt i 2007, er Crackle ejet af Sony Pictures Entertainment.

Crackle is a video streaming distributor of original web shows, Hollywood movies, and TV shows. Founded in the early 2000s as Grouper, and rebranded in 2007, Crackle is owned by Sony Pictures Entertainment.
Crackle은 오리지널 웹 쇼, 헐리우드 영화 및 TV 쇼의 비디오 스트리밍 유통업체입니다. 2000년대 초에 Grouper로 설립되어 2007년에 브랜드 이름을 변경한 Crackle은 Sony Pictures Entertainment의 소유입니다.

You are tired of Youtube apikeys? And watching the videos on the platform as maximum quality only up to 720p? [CR] Well, it's over! From our bar we present a new YouTube addon, where no APIKEY is needed, nor is there any kind of restriction to watch the videos at the highest quality offered, 720p, 1080p, 2K and 4K![CR]All this and much more plus...

Hasta las narices de las apikeys de YouTube? Y de ver como calidad máxima los videos de la plataforma solo hasta 720p?[CR]Pues se acabó! Desde nuestra taberna os presentamos un nuevo addon de YouTube, donde no hace falta APIKEY alguna, ni tampoco hay ningún tipo de restricción para ver los videos a la máxima calidad ofrecida, 720p, 1080p, 2K y 4K![CR]Todo esto y mucho mas...

extension.description: euronews bietet eine einzigartige Perspektive auf das Weltgeschehen. euronews gibt Menschen die Möglichkeit, sich eine eigene Meinung zu bilden, indem sachliche Analysen und eine Vielzahl von Standpunkten dargestellt werden.[CR]euronews Weltnachrichten täglich 24 Stunden gibt es in 12 versch. Ausgaben auf Arabisch, Englisch, Französisch, Deutsch, Griechisch, Ungarisch, Italienisch, Persisch, Portugiesisch, Russisch, Spanisch und Türkisch.
extension.disclaimer: Die von diesem Addon dargestellten Inhalte werden von den Erstellern des Addons weder gehostet oder verbreitet, noch stehen die Ersteller in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Anbietern des Inhalts.
extension.description: euronews offers a unique perspective on world affairs. euronews gives people the opportunity to form their own opinion, by presenting factual analysis and a variety of viewpoints.[CR]euronews World news daily 24 hours are available in 12 different editions in Arabic, English, French, German, Greek, Hungarian, Italian, Persian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish and Turkish.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content providers.
extension.description: Το euronews προσφέρει μια μοναδική προοπτική στις παγκόσμιες υποθέσεις. Το euronews δίνει στους ανθρώπους την ευκαιρία να διαμορφώσουν τη δική τους γνώμη, παρουσιάζοντας πραγματικές αναλύσεις και ποικίλες απόψεις.[CR]euronews World news καθημερινά 24 ώρες είναι διαθέσιμα σε 12 διαφορετικές εκδόσεις το Αραβικά, Αγγλικά, Γαλλικά, Γερμανικά, Ελληνικά, Ουγγρικά, Ιταλικά, Περσικά, Πορτογαλικά, Ρωσικά, Ισπανικά και Τουρκικά.

euronews ofrece una perspectiva única de los asuntos mundiales. euronews brinda a las personas la oportunidad de formarse su propia opinión, presentando un análisis de hechos y una variedad de puntos de vista.[CR]euronews Las noticias mundiales de 24 horas están disponibles en 12 ediciones diferentes en Árabe, Inglés, Francés, Alemán, Griego, Húngaro, Italiano, Persa, Portugués, Ruso, Español y Turco.

euronews offre une perspective unique sur les affaires mondiales. euronews donne aux gens la possibilité de se forger leur propre opinion, en présentant une analyse factuelle et une variété de points de vue.[CR]euronews World news 24 heures sur 24 est disponible en 12 éditions différentes en Arabe, Anglais, Français, Allemand, Grecque, Hongrois, Italien, Persan, Portugais, Russe, Espagnol et Turc.

Az euronews egyedülálló perspektívát kínál a világügyekkel kapcsolatban. Az euronews lehetőséget ad az embereknek arra, hogy véleményüket formálják, bemutatva tényszerű elemzéseket és különféle szempontokat.[CR]Az euronews napi 24 órás világhírek 12 különféle kiadásban érhetők el Arab, Angol, Francia, Német, Görög, Magyar, Olasz, Perzsa, Portugál, Orosz, Spanyol és Török.

euronews offre una prospettiva unica sugli affari del mondo. euronews offre alle persone l'opportunità di esprimere la propria opinione, presentando analisi fattuali e una varietà di punti di vista.[CR]euronews Notizie dal mondo ogni giorno 24 ore sono disponibili in 12 diverse edizioni in Arabo, Inglese, Francese, Tedesco, Greco, Ungherese, Italiano, Persiano, Portoghese, Russo, Spagnolo e Turco.

A euronews oferece uma perspectiva única dos assuntos mundiais. A euronews oferece às pessoas a oportunidade de formar sua própria opinião, apresentando análises factuais e vários pontos de vista.[CR]euronews As notícias mundiais diariamente 24 horas estão disponíveis em 12 edições diferentes em Árabe, Inglês, Francês, Alemão, Grego, Húngaro, Italiano, Persa, Português, Russo, Espanhol e Turco.

Евроньюс предлагает уникальный взгляд на мировые дела. euronews дает людям возможность сформировать собственное мнение, представив фактологический анализ и различные точки зрения.[CR]euronews Мировые новости ежедневно 24 часа доступны в 12 различных выпусках в Арабский, Английский, Французский, Немецкий, Греческий, Венгерский, Итальянский, Персидский, Португальский, Русский, Испанский и Турецкий.

euronews, dünya meselelerine benzersiz bir bakış açısı sunuyor. euronews, gerçeklere yönelik analizler ve çeşitli bakış açıları sunarak insanlara kendi fikirlerini oluşturma fırsatı verir.[CR]euronews Dünya haberleri her gün 24 saat içinde 12 farklı sayıda Arapça, İngilizce, Fransızca, Almanca, Yunanca, Macarca, İtalyanca, Farsça, Portekizce, Rusça, İspanyolca ve Türkçe.

extension.description: The Kavli Institute for Theoretical Physics (KITP) is a research institute of the University of California, Santa Barbara. This plugin provides access to KITP's library of online talks.

extension.summary: MY IPTV PRO - forked from livestreamspro
extension.description: (MY IPTV PRO - forked from livestreamspro) In addition to what livestreams allowed you to do, you can now, 1. call regex in regex, 2. multiple regex in page, regex in session, also htmlunescape responses 3. create session from one regex and pass onto next in line 4. save sessions to a file and open again later 5. write python code in .py file, put in the profile directory and then call from your regex. 6. use epoctime, guid and unpack as functions already defined. 7. Use it to post values to the pages to get the proper responses 8. support many headers, like origin, X-Requested-With 9. you can now append cookies in response and then read in regex using includeheaders 10. You can now link to another web url via your xml using externallink 11. support for google captcha, now you can show and then post the text

extension.news: [1.0.0] Initial version! [1.0.1] General fixes. [1.0.2] Fixed IPTV Simple intergraion. [1.0.3] Some fixes. [1.0.4] Fixed some bugs. [1.0.5] Some UI changes. [1.0.6] Added RBTV US. [1.0.7] General fixes. [1.0.8] New auth method. [1.0.9] Kodi EZ. [1.1.0] Better auth. [1.1.1] Fixed auth. [1.1.2] Speed improvements. [1.1.3] Temporary disabled auto-update. [1.1.4] Fixed some bugs. [1.1.5] Fixed "categories" menu. [1.1.6] Many changes. Due to some errors EPG only works for iptv players. [1.1.7] Some bugfixes. [1.1.8] Fixed some bugs. [1.1.9] New CZ/SK Channels. [1.2.0] Disabled EPG. [1.2.1] Small bugfixes. [1.2.2] More resolvers. [1.2.3] More channels, go to settings > playlist > playlist manager to enable 'em. [1.2.4] Simpler playlist manager. [1.2.5] Bugfixes. [1.2.6] More channels. Also Parrot TV --> Falcon [1.2.7] Kodi 18 (python 2) support. [1.2.8] Fixed some bugs. [1.2.9] You can now report stream if doesnt work. [1.3.0] Fixed some bugs. [1.3.1] Fixed some bugs. [1.3.2] Fixed Encoding. [1.3.3] Bugfixes. [1.3.4] CZSK is now disabled by default, go to settings to enable it. [1.3.5] Fixed bug with nova/markiza/RBTV generators. [1.3.6] Fixed SweetTV grabber. [1.3.7] EPG is now enabled by default. [1.3.8] Fixed bug with categories. [1.3.9] Changed epg url. [1.4.0] Guide in addon has been disabled. [1.4.1] EPG Changes. [1.4.2] Custom playlist. [1.4.3] Fixed some bugs. [1.4.4] Removed auth. [1.4.5] Fixed some bugs. [1.4.6] Forum auth, Bugfixes. [1.4.7] Fixed error on startup.

extension.description: Dieses Addon spielt Videos von YouPorn, Tube8, Boysfood, MoviesAnd, PornoTube, xHamster, KeezMovies und einigen anderen Streaming-Sites für Erwachsene ab. Es enthält explizites Material für Erwachsene. Sie können dieses Addon nur anzeigen, wenn Sie mindestens 18 Jahre alt sind oder mindestens das Alter der Mehrheit in dem Land, in dem Sie wohnen oder von dem aus Sie auf diese Inhalte zugreifen. Wenn Sie diese Anforderungen nicht erfüllen, haben Sie keine Berechtigung, dieses Addon zu verwenden.

This addon plays videos from YouPorn, Tube8, Boysfood, MoviesAnd, PornoTube, xHamster, KeezMovies and some other adult streaming sites. It contains explicit adult material. You may only view this addon if you are at least 18 years of age, or at least the age of majority in the jurisdiction where you reside or from which you access this content. If you do not meet these requirements, then you do not have permission to use this addon.

Tämä lisäosa toistaa videoita YouPorn, Tube8, Boysfood, MoviesAnd, PornoTube, xHamster, KeezMovies ja joistakin muista aikuisten suoratoistosivustoista. Se sisältää nimenomaista aikuisille tarkoitettua materiaalia. Voit tarkastella tätä lisäosaa vain, jos olet vähintään 18-vuotias tai vähintään täysi-ikäinen sen lainkäyttöalueella, jossa asut tai josta käytät tätä sisältöä. Jos et täytä näitä vaatimuksia, sinulla ei ole lupaa käyttää tätä lisäosaa.

Cet addon lit des vidéos de YouPorn, Tube8, Boysfood, MoviesAnd, PornoTube, xHamster, KeezMovies et d'autres sites de streaming pour adultes. Il contient du matériel explicite pour adultes. Vous ne pouvez voir cet addon que si vous avez au moins 18 ans, ou au moins l'âge de la majorité dans la juridiction où vous résidez ou à partir de laquelle vous accédez à ce contenu. Si vous ne remplissez pas ces conditions, vous n'êtes pas autorisé à utiliser ce module complémentaire.

Este complemento reproduz vídeos do YouPorn, Tube8, Boysfood, MoviesAnd, PornoTube, xHamster, KeezMovies e alguns outros sites de streaming adulto. Ele contém material adulto explícito. Você só pode visualizar este complemento se tiver pelo menos 18 anos de idade ou maioridade na jurisdição em que reside ou da qual acessa este conteúdo. Se você não atender a esses requisitos, não terá permissão para usar este complemento.

Du får bara se detta tillägg om du är minst 18 år, eller åtminstone majoritetsåldern i den jurisdiktion där du bor eller från vilken du får åtkomst till detta innehåll. Om du inte uppfyller dessa krav har du inte behörighet att använda detta tillägg.

extension.description: Ace Stream Handler
Ace Stream Monitor
World Build Repo
World Build Repo
World Build Repo

This addon eliminates the problem of black bars. If the black bars are hardcoded, the addon will automatically detect this and remove them. If the video is a wide screen format, the addon will also detect this and remove the black bars too.
For Android, detection of hardcoded black bars is not working currently, we are working to resolve this. All other platforms like Linux, Windows and Apple OS family everything should work correctly
extension.news: Updated the addon to use new addon.xml metadata

extension.news: 2021.03.14+matrix.1 + Modified code to make it compatible with Kodi 19. Most relevant changes: -- Remove busy dialog, it's deprecated -- Replace inputstreamaddon, it's deprecated -- Update string and list handling in scripts -- Bump versions of required addons -- Bump addon version to reflect that it's compatible with Kodi 19 -- Fix open of settings dialog from within the addon + Converted settings.xml to the new format

extension.summary: A customizable Cron timer for Kodi.
extension.description: Create cron timers for Kodi functions. This addon can schedule and run any built-in or JSON Kodi functions. No more reliance on add-on developers to allow for "timer" functionality, no more scripts running on other machines to send commands to your HTPC. All of your timers can now be handled directly within Kodi. It can also display notifications when your tasks run if configured to do so.
extension.news: Version 0.1.5 - added ability to run Built In Commands or JSON RPC commands

extension.summary: Browse movies and episodes in a variety of sorted playlists.
extension.description: Plugin for skins to provide library data throughout the skin. It can also be used as standalone plugin to browse the playlists in the video library.

extension.description: Anonymously search and download subtitles for movies and TV-Series from OpenSubtitles.org without log-in. Possibility to choose 2 subtitles which will be shown simultaneously at the bottom and top. Search in 75 languages, 4.000.000+ subtitles, daily updates.

Les sous-titres de film et téléfilm en plusieurs langues, des milliers de sous-titres traduits tous les jours. Bénéficiez de téléchargements gratuits depuis la source, du support API, une d'une communauté de millions d'utilisateurs.

Film és TV feliratok több nyelven, naponta több ezer lefordított felirat feltöltés. Ingyenes letöltés a forrástól, API támogatás, több millió felhasználó.

Subjudul film dan serial TV dalam multibahasa, ribuan subjudul diterjemah dan diunggah setiap harinya. Pengunduhan gratis dari sumber, didukung fitur antarmuka pemrograman aplikasi, dan jutaan pengguna.
Textar fyrir myndir og sjónvarpsþ. á mörgum tungumálum, þúsundir af þýddum textum upphlaðið daglega. Frítt niðurhal frá síðu, API stuðningur, milljónir notenda.

სუბტიტრები ფილმებისა და ტვ-სთვის მრავალ ენაზე. ათასობიტ თარგმნილი სუბტიტრის ატვირთვა ყოველდღიურად. უდასო ჩამოტვირტვა წყაროდან, API მხარდაჭერა, მილიონობით მომხმარებელი

Titra filmash dhe serialesh në shumë gjuhë, mijëra titra të përkthyera që vendosen çdo ditë. Shkarko nga burimi, apo nga mbështetja e API-së, miliona përdorues.

extension.disclaimer: Works without log-in
extension.news: Improved add-on by OpenSubtitles.org v5.3.1 (2021-12-15) - More font options (shadow, outline) - Possibility to swap bottom - top subtitles - Auto shift option. When enabled, the second subtitle will be synced with the first if start/end is within the time difference threshold. v5.3.0 (2021-12-11) - Possibility to choose two subtitles. One will be shown at the bottom, the other on top - Works both with Python 2 (kodi 17, 18) and Python 3 (kodi 19) v5.2.14 (2017-01-23) - Users are able to download subtitles as anonymous without authentication. Added localized descriptions, media files - New feature: Users are able to check for subtitles when Kodi is not playing, by using the manual search or by standing on an item and opening the subtitles search dialog (By key or by an external addon) | @burekas
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
